org.framed.orm.ui.figure.shapes

Class ORMNaturalTypeFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure
      • org.framed.orm.ui.figure.shapes.ORMShapeFigure
        • org.framed.orm.ui.figure.shapes.ORMNaturalTypeFigure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure

    public class ORMNaturalTypeFigure
extends ORMShapeFigure
    This figure is for Shapess from type Natrualtype. The figure looks in the viewer/editor like this: ______________ |____Name____| |Attribute | |_List_______| |Operation | |_List_______| The right side and bottom side of the figure have a border shadow. The attribute list and operation list are added through child Segments in the editparts.
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski
